column17:
Vital Gear Sevilla 25 Backpack (Black and Grey) Price: Rs.1349

Key Features

  • Ripstop and Twill Material
  • Ideal for Men and Women
  • 3 Pockets
  • 1 Compartment
  • Adjustable Shoulder Straps
  • Hip Strap

When you look outside your window every morning you see a host of backpackers taking that turn from the main road to the wild outdoors. You’ve always wanted to see what they were so excited about and explore what lies hidden in your own backyard. Call up a few friends and if they are game pack up your Vital Gear Sevilla 25 Backpack and see what lies beyond the naked eye.

Body

The night soon brightened into the morning sky and you are awakw. Brush aside any grogginess you may have and go for a bath. After which you take this unisex backpack and see if you’ve kept everything you would need. Just as you are done you hear your friends calling you. You shout back that you’re coming and rush to meet them. This backpack measures 310 x 420 x 160 mm in dimension and weighs 600 g. This makes it perfect for trips that require you to carry it around. As you make your way through the thorns spines and prickles you begin to wonder why this place is so popular. Nevertheless you keep going forward as this ripstop and twill backpack is prepared for rough surroundings.

Features

This walk is pleasurable albeit the initial setback. You make your way kicking the odd pebble off your path and looking around at a beautiful spot. This is when you see the hilltop and are excited to get to the top. Strap on the adjustable chest strap and hip strap before you start climbing. The outdoor enthusiast in you suddenly springs to life and before you know it your friends can just see the bungee cord system of your backpack. In the excitement you scrape your hand on a jagged rock and it starts to bleed. You are not alarmed as you open up the single compartment and take out your first-aid kit. Take out the bandages that are kept in one of the 3 pockets and you are good to go.

This is probably the only problem you face on this trip despite the sizeable load you are carrying. The Vital Gear backpack comes with adjustable mesh shoulder straps and 3D aircore back padding that keep the strain of your shoulders and back. Once you reach the top of the hill you see a sight that you’ll never forget. You can’t help but think of those wasted moments you spent looking out the window at the backpackers.

The rush to get to the top is almost suffocating. In a world that runs on cut-throat competition it is impossible for you to fall back one step. After years and years of struggle you’ve finally reached where you want to be. Now you can relax and what better way than to go on that trek you’ve been putting off forever. Call your friends and pack up your Vital Gear Ibiza 30 Backpack your time is finally here.

Body

Similar to your struggle your friends have sacrificed their youth and best times to get here. All of you deserve this time for yourselves. Wake up feeling refreshed and energised as if it’s a whole new beginning. After you’re ready take the car and pick up your friends on the way to the trekking spot. The whole ride you keep talking about how much work you guys have had over the years. Measuring 280 x 460 x 230 mm in dimension this unisex backpack sits in the middle of the conversation that spans a decade worth of memories. All of you have had plenty of experience exploring the wild outdoors and you are prepared with this ripstop and twill backpack which is durable and can be cleaned easily. An 800 g backpack is ideal for this trekking trip.

Features

You reach the park when the sun rays are just stroking the grass awake. Take a breath of this clean pure air and begin this journey. For your protection and convenience this backpack from Vital Gear comes with adjustable chest strap and hip strap. The first few steps remind you of the good old days where you didn’t have fancy shoes and a lot of money. The glory days cloud your memory as you open up one of the 2 compartments for a towel. On the off chance of an emergency at work you have carried your tablet in the organizer with built-in tablet compartment.

You take a break after a while and screen through the 3 pockets to find a bottle of water. Months of sitting in stuffy corporate rooms have taken its toll on you. Walk as long as you can as the 3D aircore back padding along with adjustable mesh shoulder straps keep the strain off your back. When you’ve reached the summit all those years of blood and toil seem worth it.

Pending work at office grocery shopping appointment with the doctor and other chores you need to do these are the things that are floating in your head right now. Suddenly in the spark of the moment you decide that you need a holiday to calm your nerves. You go back home pack your belongings in the Vital Gear Pamplona 30 Backpack and take the first bus to the countryside. The lush pastures and fresh air rejuvenate your tired mind and body and make you forget about all your worries. The unisex bag you are carrying is your only companion. You have carried this bag on several casual occasions.

Body

You’ve climbed hills trailed and walked roughed paths with this backpack sitting on your shoulders but as it is made of Ripstop and Twill it shows resilience. You carry this bag around with comfort as it measures 260 x 460 x 150 mm in dimension which make it less bulky. You perform all your activities with ease as this backpack weighs only 700 g which makes it lightweight.

Features

At times when you travel to other cities for work this backpack comes in handy as it has a laptop compartment. For this trip you kept your clothes in the front compartment of this bag to reach them quickly. Your music player and energy bars are in the front pocket and your water bottle and torch in the side pockets of this backpack. At times you carry your tablet while travelling and this backpack is equipped with an organiser with built-in compartment for this gadget. When you are climbing hills or walking long distances the mesh shoulder straps of this backpack provide you with comfort. To keep your mobile safe and in close reach this Vital Gear Pamplona 30 Backpack has a dual zone cellphone mesh pocket. When you need to keep the load in place and prevent it from shifting you adjust the chest strap of this backpack.

The 2 compartments and 3 pockets of this backpack allow you to segregate and arrange all your belongings in order of use. When you are trekking or cycling the hip strap helps hold the bag in one place. Sweat is unavoidable when you wear a backpack but the 3D aircore back padding keeps you dry and clean. As you are an adventure buff the bungee cord system on 2 sides is what caught your attention. Further this backpack is equipped with adjustable shoulder straps.

  • Medium Bag

It becomes difficult for you to carry your laptop documents and other belongings to office in different bags. So you decide to buy the Vital Gear Techno 4 Medium Backpack for yourself to put an end to all your woes. This unisex bag can be carried to casual occasions like work on a daily basis or weekend getaways.

Body

As this backpack is made of 600D Polyester it will last you long and be resistant to common damages like tearing and ripping. With dimensions of 360 x 450 x 200 mm this backpack will go easy on your shoulders and maintain a slender profile. Weighing 900 g this Vital Gear Techno 4 Medium Backpack is lightweight and will let you walk to work with ease. You can accommodate your belongings for a good day at office in this bag as it is medium sized.

Features

Crafted to accommodate a laptop with ease this backpack is equipped with a top load padded laptop holder. You can keep your stationery gadgets like music player and other essentials in the organiser panel of this backpack. You can alter the adjustable shoulder straps according to your convenience. Keeping this Vital Gear Backpack in place are the adjustable chest and hip straps. For your water bottle and other accessories this bag has side pockets. When you don’t want to strap on this bag you can use the top handle for your carrying comfort. For your files documents and other items this bag is furnished with 3 compartments and 2 pockets. Sweat is inevitable when a backpack is strapped on to your back but this bag has a 3D padded aircore back system which allows a sufficient supply of air keeping you dry and clean. While you are travelling or walking your essentials are kept safe by  the pull of a zip. Carrying multiple bags to work could become a mess as you might end up leaving something in the bus or train and not find stuff at the right time. This Vital Gear Techno 4 Medium Backpack allows you to carry all your essentials for a busy day at office in one single bag.
